name: 8-Bit Wiz
description:
This is for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 "Stronger Together". Fight your way through endless rooms of constantly hardening enemies, as a wizard with modern day weaponry, whilst collecting potions and weapons along the way. Use your potions immediately, or combine multiple in order to increase the effect and power of them. With the enemies constantly becoming faster and stronger, you need to make your decisions wisely... try not to die!

Credits:

Music: Christian Timothy, Development and Art: Harrison Timothy.
